lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class PopCanChannelSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.PopCanChannelSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractPopCanAcceptor

    public class PopCanChannelSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractPopCanAcceptor
    Represents the hardware through which a pop can is carried from one device to another. Once the hardware is configured, pop can channels will not be used directly by other applications.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PopCanChannelSimulator(AbstractPopCanAcceptor sink)
      Creates a new pop can channel whose output will go to the indicated sink.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptPop(PopCan pop)
      This method should only be called from simulated hardware devices.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PopCanChannelSimulator

        public PopCanChannelSimulator(AbstractPopCanAcceptor sink)
        Creates a new pop can channel whose output will go to the indicated sink.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptPop

        public void acceptPop(PopCan pop)
               throws CapacityExceededException,
                      DisabledException
        This method should only be called from simulated hardware devices.
        Specified by:
        acceptPop in interface AbstractPopCanAcceptor
        Parameters:
        pop - The pop can to be taken as input.
        Throws:
        CapacityExceededException - if the output sink cannot accept the pop.
        DisabledException - if the output sink is currently disabled.
